price: Yã kai Yahaya! Ka kãma littãfi da ƙarfi. Kuma Muka bã shi hukunci yanã yãro.*
arabic: يَٰيَحۡيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِقُوَّةٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمَ صَبِيّٗا
footnotes: * Yahaya dan zakariyya, shi ne Annabi da aka bai wa hukunci tun yanã yãro. Kuma Shĩ ne mai bãyar da bushãra da Ĩsa, amincin Allah ya tabbata agare su.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāyaḥyā khudhi al-kitāba biquwwatin waātaynāhu al-ḥuk'ma ṣabiyyan
